author: Stahly
description:
Before the whole Black Friday and Cyber Monday craziness begins, Amazon is once again offering a two-day exclusive shopping event in October for Prime subscribers. Alongside all sorts of consumer electronics, the Amazon Prime Days always offer fantastic deals on Joy Toy Warhammer figures as well as airbrushing and photography hobby supplies. To save you the trouble of a long search, I've compiled the best deals in this post—naturally, only on items I use myself and have vouched for.

The post ToP Tip: Best hobby Prime Day deals Oct 2025 appeared first on Tale of Painters.
title: ToP Tip: Best hobby Prime Day deals Oct 2025
